name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 0 Code 0 (echo-Reply) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on egress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 0 Code 0 (echo-Reply) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on ingress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 8 Code 0 (echo) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on egress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 8 Code 0 (echo) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on ingress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: worker_nodes
business_justification: EKS worker nodes require outbound HTTPS to AWS SSM API using the VPC Endpoint for patching and command execution.

name: app_nodes
business_justification: Application pods need to initiate HTTPS requests to internal API Gateway for service communication within the VPC.

name: api_gateway
business_justification: Internal API Gateway invokes Lambda-based services over HTTPS for business logic execution.

name: lambda_bird_app
business_justification: Allow response traffic from Lambda back to API Gateway over HTTPS to complete the request cycle.
